subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Scott Boras was likely calling the Yankees’ bluff in their stated position that they would not seek to sign Alex Rodriguez if he opted out. If that is the case, in this poker game Boras could lose.
snippet: Scott Boras was likely calling the Yankees’ bluff in their stated position that they would not seek to sign Alex Rodriguez if he opted out. If that is the case, in this poker game Boras could lose.
